00844         private static String distanceVar(int n, int i, int uk) {
00845                 Double[] distance_i = new Double[ARRAYLENGTH];
00846                 DecimalFormat[] myFormat_i = new DecimalFormat[ARRAYLENGTH];
00847                 place_i[n] = hm.get(uk);
00848 
00849                 int befkey = uk;
00850                 distanceVariable_i[n] = null;
00851 
00852                 if (uk > 100) {
00853                         befkey = uk - 100;
00854                         distance_i[n] = DistanceCalculation.distFrom(
00855                                         placesArrayLat2[befkey], placesArrayLng2[befkey],
00856                                         place_i[n].geometry.location.lat,
00857                                         place_i[n].geometry.location.lng);
00858                         Log.d("filter", "  place distance calc " + distance_i[n].toString());
00859                         myFormat_i[n] = new DecimalFormat("0.0");
00860                         distanceVariable_i[n] = myFormat_i[n].format(distance_i[n]);
00861 
00862 
00863                         // error - does not get second place reference here because loops
00864                         // through all to get to it
00865                         // secondPlaceReference[nameCount] = place_i[n].reference;
00866                         Log.d("second", "1 secondPlaceReference[nameCount]  " + nameCount);
00867                         nameCount++;
00868                         // Log.d("distance", "This is place i over 100  " + place_i[n]);
00869 
00870                 } else {
00871                         // this distance variable needs to loop????
00872                         distance_i[n] = DistanceCalculation.distFrom(placesArrayLat[i],
00873                                         placesArrayLng[i], place_i[n].geometry.location.lat,
00874                                         place_i[n].geometry.location.lng);
00875                         Log.d("filter", "  place distance calc " + distance_i[n].toString());
00876                         myFormat_i[n] = new DecimalFormat("0.0");
00877                         distanceVariable_i[n] = myFormat_i[n].format(distance_i[n]);
00878                         nameArr[1] = place_i[n].name;
00879 
00880                         // --------------------------------------------
00881                         // secondPlaceReference[1] = place_i[n].reference;
00882                         Log.d("second", "2 secondPlaceReference[nameCount]  " + nameCount);
00883                         Log.d("distance", "This is place i under 100  " + place_i[n]);
00884                         Log.d("distance", "This is secondPlaceReference[1]  "
00885                                         + secondPlaceReference[1]);
00886                 }
00887                 return distanceVariable_i[n];
00888         }
00889         
00890         public boolean nearInd(String distanceVariable, int nearCounterIn){
00891         
00892                 nearcounter++;
00893                 Double dv = Double.parseDouble(distanceVariable);
00894                 try{
00895                         if(dv < nearMaxDistance){
00896                                 near[nearcounter] = true;
00897                                 Log.d("true distance", "true dv is " + dv + " and near max distance is " + nearMaxDistance);
00898                                 
00899                         }//end inductive if
00900                         else{
00901                                         near[nearcounter] = false;
00902                                         Log.d("true distance", "false dv is " + dv + " and near max distance is " + nearMaxDistance);
00903                         }//end else
00904 
00905                         }catch(Exception e){
00906                                 Log.d("exception", e.toString());
00907                         }//end catch
00908                 
00909                 Log.d("nearcounter", "near is " + near[nearcounter] + " and method accessed " + nearcounter + " times." );
00910                 return near[nearcounter];
00911                 
00912         }//end method
